com.communote.server.web.fe.portal.blog.controller

Class InitialFiltersViewController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.context.support.ApplicationObjectSupport
      • org.springframework.web.context.support.WebApplicationObjectSupport
        • org.springframework.web.servlet.support.WebContentGenerator
          • org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.AbstractController
            • com.communote.server.web.commons.controller.VelocityViewController
              • com.communote.server.web.fe.portal.blog.controller.InitialFiltersViewController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.beans.factory.Aware, org.springframework.context.ApplicationContextAware, org.springframework.web.context.ServletContextAware, org.springframework.web.servlet.mvc.Controller
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CreateBlogViewController, UserViewController

    public class InitialFiltersViewController
extends VelocityViewController
    This controller can put initial filter parameters in the model which are retrieved by interpreting the request URL as a permanent link.
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected InitalFiltersVO createInitialFilters(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
      Creates the initial filters by invoking prefillInitalFilters(HttpServletRequest) and passing the prefilled VO to BlogManagement.fillIntalFilters.

      Returns the template to be used for rendering the view

      Returns the identifier to be exported as selected menu.

      Called when a AuthorizationException is thrown while the initial filters are created.

      Called when a NotFoundException is thrown while the initial filters are created.

      Called after createInitialFilters(HttpServletRequest) succeeded, to allow subclasses to do further modifications on the filters

    • Method Detail

      • createInitialFilters

        protected InitalFiltersVO createInitialFilters(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
                                        throws NotFoundException,
                                               AuthorizationException
        Creates the initial filters by invoking prefillInitalFilters(HttpServletRequest) and passing the prefilled VO to BlogManagement.fillIntalFilters.
        Parameters:
        request - the request
        Returns:
        the initial filters or null
        Throws:
        NotFoundException - if the resource identified by the permanent link cannot be found
        AuthorizationException - if the current user has no access to the resource identified by the permanent link

      • getContentTemplate

        protected String getContentTemplate(Map<String,Object> model)
        Returns the template to be used for rendering the view
        Overrides:

        Parameters:
        model - the current model of the model and view
        Returns:
        the contentTemplate
        See Also:

        Returns the identifier to be exported as selected menu.
        Overrides:

        Parameters:
        model - the current model of the model and view
        Returns:
        the selected menu
        See Also:

      • handleAuthorizationException

        protected boolean handleAuthorizationException(AuthorizationException e,
                                               javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
                                        throws IOException
        Called when a AuthorizationException is thrown while the initial filters are created. The default implementation sends a 403.
        Parameters:
        e - the exception
        response - the response object
        Returns:
        if the response should be considered to be committed
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of an IOException when writing to the response

      • handleNotFoundException

        protected boolean handleNotFoundException(NotFoundException e,
                                          javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                          javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
                                   throws IOException
        Called when a NotFoundException is thrown while the initial filters are created. The default implementation sends a 404.
        Parameters:
        e - the exception
        request - The request.
        response - the response object
        Returns:
        if the response should be considered to be committed
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of an IOException when writing to the response

      • postCreateInitialFilters

        protected InitalFiltersVO postCreateInitialFilters(InitalFiltersVO filters)
                                            throws AuthorizationException
        Called after createInitialFilters(HttpServletRequest) succeeded, to allow subclasses to do further modifications on the filters
        Parameters:
        filters - the filters created, can be null if no filters were created
        Returns:
        the modified filters
        Throws:
        AuthorizationException

      • prefillInitalFilters

        protected InitalFiltersVO prefillInitalFilters(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
                                        throws NotFoundException
        Prefill the initial filters by extracting the values from the request URL that is interpreted as permalink
        Parameters:
        request - the request
        Returns:
        the prefilled filters or null if the URL isn't a supported permanent link
        Throws:
        NotFoundException - in case the permalink refers to a tag entity which does not exist

      • prepareModel

        protected boolean prepareModel(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                               javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response,
                               Map<String,Object> model)
                        throws Exception
        Prepares the model by adding the key value pairs.
        Overrides:
        prepareModel in class VelocityViewController
        Parameters:
        request - the request
        response - the response
        model - the model to prepare
        Returns:
        true if the preparation succeeded and the model can be passed to the view to write to the response. False should be returned if an error occurred and the error handler already wrote to the response which is now considered to be committed.
        Throws:
        Exception - Exception.

      • setFiltersFoundContentTemplate

        public void setFiltersFoundContentTemplate(String template)
        Set a template that should be rendered when initial filters are defined. If no initial filters are defined the template defined by #setContentTemplate(String)) will be used.
        Parameters:
        template - the template to render, if null the template defined by #setContentTemplate(String)) will always be used. The default value for this template is null.

      • setFiltersFoundSelectedMenu

        public void setFiltersFoundSelectedMenu(String menuId)
        Sets the identifier of the menu that should be marked as selected when initial filters are defined. If no initial filters are defined the identifier defined by #setSelectedMenu(String)) will be used.
        Parameters:
        menuId - the menu identifier to set, if null the identifier defined by #setSelectedMenu(String)) will always be used. The default value for this identifier is null.

      • setPermalinkIdsToRecognize

        public void setPermalinkIdsToRecognize(Set<String> ids)
        Set the IDs the view should recognize as permanent link identifier when creating the initial filters.
        Parameters:
        ids - the IDs to recognize, this should be any of the PermalinkGenerator.PERMA_ID_* constants
